title: What is your content telling you? Making informed product decisions with content analysis and visualization
abstract: Uncovering content trends unique to your organization can bring clarity to product development decisions. This is the story of how Pearson leveraged MarkLogic for data analysis and visualization, content workflows, and application development to build smart, agile systems, and pioneer new digital models and learning experiences. This talk will cover how to 1.) Leverage data querying and visualization for product management decisions, 2.) Build flexible transformation workflows and rigorous validation processes to deliver high-quality content, and 3.) Design content workflows and agile product development processes to meet shifting user requirements.
